item.title: Gamedev
item.description: Maturity Zig is actively used for game development by both hobbyists for side projects, as well as a few seriously committed individuals who do Zig game development full time. Libraries and bindings exist for most things, and general purpose engines/frameworks/ecosystems are in early stages of development. item.title: The Zig Programming Language
item.description: Is Zig complete? No, Zig is still in heavy development. If you want to help us move forward faster, consider donating so that we can pay more contributors for their time. Is Zig made by a big tech company? No, Zig is supported by the Zig Software Foundation, a 501(c)(3) non-profit company. We will never concede board seats to any big tech company. Learn more about the ZSF Is Zig production-ready?

item.title: Web Development
item.description: Maturity The Zig Web Development ecosystem is still very immature. At this stage we recommend you consider Zig only if you’re interested in looking under the hood of modern web development. Libraries / tools Databases TigerBeetle is distributed database for financial transactions written in Zig Sqlite leroycep/sqlite-zig vrishmann/zig-sqlite Redis kristoff-it/zig-okredis HTTP & related ducdetronquito/h11 I/O free state machine implementation of the HTTP/1.1 protocol. Vexu/routez HTTP server written in Zig Vexu/zuri URI parser written in Zig Webby file formats JSON Available in the Zig standard library under std.
